keyboard_check_released: With this function you can check to see if a key has been released or not. Unlike the keyboard_check() function, this function will only run once for every time the key is lifted, so for it to trigger again, the key must be first pressed and then released again. The function will take a keycode value as returned by the function ord() (only capital letters from A-Z or numbers from 0-9), or any of the vk_* constants listed on the main Keyboard Input page.
